title: TED5 ERROR: Error loading file GFXINFOE.CK4
content:
I get the error "TED5 ERROR: Error loading file GFXINFOE.CK4" every time I try to run TED5 to open Keen 4![img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-offended.gif[/img] (obviously because I don't have that file.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dead.gif[/img] ) What do I do???[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-furious.gif[/img] [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img] [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dead.gif[/img] [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-mortlol.gif[/img] -------------------

title: Re: TED5 ERROR: Error loading file GFXINFOE.CK4
content:
Letsee:

Are you using XP? If so, try DOSbox.

Did you run tedsetup first?

Is your game version 1.0? it has to be 1.4

Is the graphics edited? They can't be.[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v609/genius314/picturekeen.bmp[/img]

title: Re: TED5 ERROR: Error loading file GFXINFOE.CK4
content: Grrg.. I wish I'd knew more about TED5 problems.. But well, try those that Genius314 suggested, often the problem has something to do with wrong version of Keen or un-unlzexed exe.You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!

title: Re: TED5 ERROR: Error loading file GFXINFOE.CK4
content:
The problem was that I wasn't using version 1.4, thanks![img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img] -------------------

title: Re: TED5 ERROR: Error loading file GFXINFOE.CK4
content: Actually, i thought the only problem that could come from using the wrong version was that there weren't any of the icons. I guess not. [img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v609/genius314/picturekeen.bmp[/img]
